author: vorot93
content: stupid question: why did we create RLP, and not pick, say, XDR (Stellar uses it)?

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: XDR does not support uint256 afaik

author: .vbuterin
content: the practical answer is that RLP was designed as a more sane replacement for DER encoding which Bitcoin used, which is horrible and has special cases and unneeded features all over the place
